definition-item.definition-title: CASTING OF METALS; CASTING OF OTHER SUBSTANCES BY THE SAME PROCESSES OR DEVICES (shaping of plastics or substances in a plastic state B29C; metallurgical processing, selection of substances to be added to metal C21, C22)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The casting of metals and of other substances by the same processes or machines. By "other substances" is meant basically the group of non-metals, e.g. silicon.
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Processing of pig iron, e.g. refining, manufacture of wrought iron or steel

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Part of a mould used in a casting process that forms the internal shapes of a casting, which cannot be shaped by the pattern
Channel that allow the molten metal to enter the mould cavity during casting

definition-item.definition-title: Treatment of fused masses in the ladle or the supply runners before casting {(for continuous casting B22D11/10; metallurgical processing, e.g. refining of iron or other metal C21, C22, C25C)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Treatment on reduced scale of the molten metal , whether in the ladle or in the supply runners.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Refining of metals by electrolysis of melts

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Portion of the gate assemby that connects the sprue with the gate

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangement of indicating or measuring devices, e.g. for temperature or viscosity of the fused mass

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Measuring devices for process parameters during casting, e.g. temperature or viscosity of the fused mass, thickness of a frozen shell.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
If the measurement is part of a regulating process, then classification is also given in the relevant groups (e.g. B22D11/16 - B22D11/225).

definition-item.definition-title: Pig or like casting (equipment for conveying molten metal B22D35/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Methods, machines or plants for casting pigs.
This place does not cover:
Equipment for conveying molten metal to the pig moulds is classified in B22D35/00 - B22D35/06.
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: A metal casting,produced in a mould provided that it is intended for remelting before use

definition-item.definition-title: Machines or plants for pig or like casting

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines or plants for pig casting, e.g. devices for stacking pigs, rotary casting tables.

definition-item.definition-title: Casting ingots, {e.g. from ferrous metals} (equipment for conveying molten metal B22D35/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Casting processes, machines or plants for casting of ingots in definite lengths.
This place does not cover:
Equipment for conveying molten metal to the ingot moulds is classified in B22D35/00 - B22D35/06.
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: A metal casting, produced in a mould for subsequently rolling or forging

Insulating cover placed in the upper region of an ingot mould to reduce heat loss of the solidifying metal, resulting in a longer solidification time whereby the shrinkage cavity is located higher in the ingot

definition-item.definition-title: Machines or plants for casting ingots

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines or plants for top or bottom casting.

definition-item.definition-title: Continuous casting of metals, i.e. casting in indefinite lengths (metal drawing, metal extruding B21C)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Methods and machines for casting metals in indefinite lengths.
B22D11/0401 covers moulds provided at their top with a refractory heat insulating reservoir for feeding the mould.

B22D11/0475 covers continuous casting processes wherein a ceramic ring is mounted between a molten metal holding vessel and the continuous casting mould, in order to provide a steady supply of liquid metal to the mould.

B22D11/049 covers continuous metal casting where the cooling water flows from the underside of the mold cooling chamber and sprays directly on the ingot surface, thereby completing the solidification process.
B22D11/1206 covers methods and machines for applying a light rolling reduction on a strand which is not completely solidified.

B22D11/122 covers methods and machines for creating a magnetic field around a solidifying cast strand, emerged from the mould, in order to stir the molten core of the strand to obtain a homogeneous structure.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Casting of ingots in definite lengths Metal drawing, metal extruding

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Rolls; Lubricating or cooling rolls while in use (rolling metals)
Construction of the conveyor rolls (for glass)
Rolls; Drums; Roll arrangements (in continuous furnaces)
Transport or conveyor rolls for furnaces

section-body.paragraph-text: The composition of the specific alloys (B22D11/001 - B22D11/004) is also classified in C22C (alloys).
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: A bar which plugs a mould opening at the start of the casting procedure, and which is gradually withdrawn from the mould, as the molten metal solidifies, in order to remove the cast ingot from the mould

definition-item.definition-title: Centrifugal casting; Casting by using centrifugal force

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Centrifugal casting or casting by using a centrifugal force to produce shallow bodies or elongated bodies in definite lengths; the necessary accessory devices, processes and machines.
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

The accessories for the centrifugal casting apparatus (like moulds, linings, means for feeding molten metal, removing castings) are classified in B22D13/10 - B22D13/108; if it is clearly from the description that they could also be used for other particular casting processes then they are also classified in those relevant groups.

definition-item.definition-title: Casting using a mould or core of which a part significant to the process is of high thermal conductivity, e.g. chill casting; Moulds or accessories specially adapted therefor

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Casting using a mould or core with an insert of high thermal conductivity, to locally increase the rate of heat removal during solidification of the molten metal and thereby define the structure of the casting.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Continuous casting into open-ended moulds for direct chill casting

definition-item.definition-title: Pressure die casting or injection die casting, i.e. casting in which the metal is forced into a mould under high pressure

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Casting in an injection casting mould, whereby the molten metal is injected into the mould under high pressure; the necessary accessory devices, processes and machines.
B22D17/002 covers moulds which are moving outside the normal working position during each moulding cycle
B22D17/005 covers moulds wherein two or more fixed mould parts are cooperating each with a moveable counterpart ; see WO238311-fig.1
B22D17/007 covers a method wherein the injected metal is in a semi solid state
B22D17/04 covers machines wherein the metal which is melted in a heated press chamber, is moved from this press chamber to the mould cavity by means of a plunger
B22D17/06 covers machines wherein the metal which is melted in a heated press chamber, is moved from this press chamber to the mould cavity by means of air pressure
B22D17/30 covers accessories for supplying the molten metal to the shot sleeve.
Methods and machines for injection moulding of plastics are classified in B29C.
If it is clearly stated in a document that the content also applies to injection die casting metals, then a class is also given in B22D17/00.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Equipment for supplying molten metal in rations
Accessories for reinforcing or securing moulding materials or cores

section-body.paragraph-text: All documents concerning mechanisms or devices for opening, closing or clamping pressure die casting moulds for casting metals , are also classified in the relevant groups B29C45/64 - B29C45/68.
B22D17/2007 covers methods and apparatus for lubricating moulds.
If a composition is also included, then in addition a B22C3/00 class is also given.
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Reservoir, containing the necessary amount of molten metal to make a casting , and from where this molten metal is pressed into the mould

definition-item.definition-title: Pressure casting; Vacuum casting (B22D17/00 takes precedence; treating the metal in the mould by using pressure or vacuum B22D27/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Casting whereby a low pressure or a vacuum is used to pressurize the molten metal; the necessary machines, processes and controlling.

B22D18/02 covers processes and machines wherein an amount of liquid metal ,required for one casting part, being introduced in the cavity of a lower mould and thereafter a convex portion of an upper mould being advanced in the cavity filled with molten metal, which metal undergoes a compression during this forging step.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Aftertreating by using pressure on the metal in the mould, while it is molten or ductile
Aftertreating by using vacuum on the metal in the mould, while it is molten or ductile

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Casting in, on, or around objects which form part of the product (B22D23/04 takes precedence; alumino-thermic welding B23K23/00; coating by casting molten material on the substrate C23C6/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Processes and devices whereby a casting is done on, in or around a body part, which forms afterwards an essential part of the product.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Coating by casting molten metal on a substrate

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Repairing fractures or cracked metal parts

definition-item.definition-title: Casting non-ferrous metals or metallic compounds so far as their metallurgical properties are of importance for the casting procedure; Selection of compositions therefor {(non-ferrous ingots B22D7/005)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Casting of products from non-ferrous metals wherein the metallurgical properties of the metal play an important role in the casting process.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Casting ingots from non ferrous metals

section-body.paragraph-text: Casting aluminium or magnesium is not classified in B22D21/04 but in B22D21/007.
The corresponding compositions of the metallic compounds or alloys have also to be classified in C22C.

definition-item.definition-title: Casting processes not provided for in groups B22D1/00 - B22D21/00 (making metallic powder by casting B22F9/08; alumino-thermic welding B23K23/00; remelting metals C22B9/16)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Casting processes not provided for in groups B22D1/00 - B22D21/00, for example:

B22D23/003 covers methods and devices for spraying molten metal on the surface of a pattern (or core); after solidification of the molten metal, the pattern (or core) is removed, leaving a cast piece.
B22D23/02 covers methods and devices where the molten metal is poured from the top into the mould
B22D23/04 covers methods and devices where

list-item.paragraph-text: a mould is filled by submerging in a molten metal pool

section-body.paragraph-text: or

a core is immerged in a molten metal pool; after solidification of a predetermined layer of molten metal on the core surface, the core is removed, leaving a cast piece. B22D23/06 covers melting-down metal in the mould
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Special casting characterised by the nature of the product (B22D15/02, B22D17/16, B22D19/00 take precedence; casting stereotype plates B41D3/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Casting methods and apparatuses where the nature of the obtained product is characteristic; this nature could be a specific shape (like pieces of art,metal foams,jewelry)or a specific physical property (like uniform hardness).
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Alloys with open or closed pores

section-body.paragraph-text: Documents classified in these groups need also to be classified according to their casting process (B22D13/00 - B22D23/00).

definition-item.definition-title: Treating the metal in the mould while it is molten or ductile (B22D7/12, B22D11/10, B22D43/00 take precedence); {Pressure or vacuum casting (B22D17/00 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The treatment of the molten metal after its introduction in the mould and during its solidification.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Use of electric or magnetic effects in continuous casting
Cooling moulds with travelling walls during continuous casting
Treating molten metal in the continuous casting mould
Controlling for cooling cast stock or mould in continuous casting
Casting processes and apparatuses using pressure to fill the mould
Exerting after-pressure on the moulding material during injection die casting
Cooling dies in pressure injection die casting
Casting processes and apparatuses using vacuum to fill the mould

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Removing castings from moulds, not restricted to casting processes covered by a single main group; Removing cores; Handling ingots {(B22D13/10, B22D11/124, B22D17/00 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The removing of castings and ingots from their moulds and the removing of cores from the cast pieces; the necessary processes, machines and accessory devices.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Removing castings from centrifugal casting moulds
Evacuating cast pieces from injection die casting moulds
Treating the metal in the mould by vibrating the mould

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: A metal frame used for making and holding a refractory mould

definition-item.definition-title: Cooling castings, not restricted to casting processes covered by a single main group (accessories for cooling cast stock in continuous casting of metals B22D11/124; controlling or regulating processes or operations for cooling cast stock or mould in continuous casting of metals B22D11/22; chill casting B22D15/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Cooling of castings when removed totally or partly from the moulds and where the surface of the casting is totally or partly in direct contact with a cooling fluid.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Open-ended moulds for direct chill casting
Cooling moulds with travelling walls during continuous casting
Controlling for cooling cast stock or mould in continuous casting
Cooling dies in pressure injection die casting

definition-item.definition-title: Cutting-off surplus material, e.g. gates; {Cleaning and working on castings (B22D17/2076 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The removing of the gating systems from the castings and the subsequently cleaning of the castings, the removal of any parts of the casting/gating system, e.g. removal of risers
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cutting off equipment for sprues or ingates combined with an injection die casting machine

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Specific constructions of machines for removing the gates from the casting or cleaning the casting are classified in the relevant groups (B23D, B24B).

definition-item.definition-title: Equipment for handling moulds

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Any equipment for handling moulds after their manufacture.
B22D33/005 covers the transport of sand moulds which have been taken out from their flask
B22D33/06 covers equipment for placing or removing weights on the cope and drag mould parts, to prevent shifting during casting.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: the top half of a horizontally parted mould
the bottom half of a horizontally parted mould

a mould which is made in a moulding machine wherein one or more flasks forming part of the machine and where after compacting the moulding material, the mould is removed from the flask(s) and set side by side on a conveyor

definition-item.definition-title: Equipment for conveying molten metal into beds or moulds (B22D37/00 - B22D41/00 take precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Equipment for conveying molten metal into beds or moulds, in general; heating or cooling of the molten metal in an equipment for conveying the metal into moulds or beds.
Heating/cooling of moulds is classified in B22C9/065
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Means for forcing molten metal into an injection die
Supplying molten metal in pressure die casting

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: a moulding sand layer (mostly on ground level) wherein a multiple mould cluster has been made

definition-item.definition-title: Controlling or regulating the pouring of molten metal from a casting melt-holding vessel ({B22D11/18,} B22D39/00, B22D41/00 take precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The control and the shielding of the molten metal stream issuing from a vessel.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Controlling or regulating processes for pouring in continuous casting
Supplying molten metal in ration s

definition-item.definition-title: Equipment for supplying molten metal in rations

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
All kind of equipment making it possible to deliver the amount of molten metal, necessary to produce a casting.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Accessories for supplying molten metal in pressure die casting machines

section-body.paragraph-text: If the equipment is adapted for a particular casting machine (B22D13/00-B22D25/00) it is classified in the relevant group for that casting machine and in the relevant subgroup of B22D39/00 - B22D39/06.

definition-item.definition-title: Casting melt-holding vessels, e.g. ladles, tundishes, cups or the like (B22D39/00, B22D43/00 take precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Casting vessels (ladles, tundishes or cups);
Their constructionnal features like cooling or heating means, linings, pouring nozzles and closure means;
Working methods of these vessels.
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: A pad or a boxlike device of erosion resistant material positioned on the floor of a melt-holding vessel to receive the incoming stream of molten metal poured into the said vessel from a higher positioned vessel

A rotating tower is supporting two casting ladles in such a way that one ladle is 'on cast' (feeding the casting machine) while the other is made ready, and is switched to the casting position once the first ladle is empty.

definition-item.definition-title: Mechanical cleaning, e.g. skimming of molten metals

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Removing or holding back dirt or slag from the surface of the molten metal before or during casting.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Removing or retaining slag in furnaces

definition-item.definition-title: Equipment for casting, not otherwise provided for

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Any kind of casting equipment for which no specific entry exists.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Removal of waste gases or dust during steel making
Extraction of waste gases in furnaces

definition-item.definition-title: Controlling, supervising, not restricted to casting covered by a single main group, e.g. for safety reasons (controlling or regulating in general G05)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Any kind of controlling which is not associated with a single specific casting process.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Controlling or regulating processes during continuous casting
Controlling equipment in injection die casting machines
Controlling pouring from a melt-holding vessel

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Casting plants

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The lay-out of a casting plant which may comprise a combination of machines used during the whole casting process, eventually together with the preceding moulding plant.
